Don't forget guys to put the full crack path into: Real Time Shields - File System Shield - Exclusions as C:Program FilesAVAST SoftwareAvastVersion.dll to prevent any possibility of it being rumbled. Also put the same exclusion into Settings - Exclusions to prevent the Boot Time scan from possibly picking it up as a reported prolem.
